messages.text: in the recent time with the rise of ai will this able to identify the fake news

Based on the document content, the answer to your question is:

No, the ability to identify fake news may not be as effective with the rise of AI-generated content. According to the document, "The quest to identify and mitigate fake news is increasingly challenging due to the dynamic and sophisticated nature of misinformation, especially with the rise of AI-generated content."

This statement suggests that the rise of AI-generated content has made it more difficult to identify fake news, implying that the methods used in this research may not be as effective against this new type of misinformation.
